item.title: Evaluating Cooper's Goal Directed Design
item.description: Steve Jobs suggested that the key to successful software is user experience. He states (2011:01.53.04”) “One of the things that I have always found is, that, you have got to start with the customer experience and work backwards to the technology…we have tried to come up with a strategy and a vision for apple, it started with what incredible benefits can we give the customer, where can we take the customer”.
